H0.text: What name is given to a figure of speech by means of which contradictory terms are combined. Paradoxon

H1.text: What name is given to a figure of speech by means of which contradictory terms are combined. Contraria

H2.text: What name is given to a figure of speech by means of which contradictory terms are combined. Dialectica

H3.text: What name is given to a figure of speech by means of which contradictory terms are combined. Oxymora

A4.text: The term 'oxymoron' is used in the title of the paper.
